title: Bruno Mars is the Baddest today, Blue Ivy bids $19,000, March Madness along with more details for Sand and Soul
itunes:title: Bruno Mars is the Baddest today, Blue Ivy bids $19,000, March Madness along with more details for Sand and Soul
description:
Steve tries to mentor Tommy. Bruno Mars gets slammed for cultural appropriation and is defended by Big Dog and Stevie Wonder. Blue Ivy gets her bid in at an auction. Make sure to get Steve's Closing Remarks Release and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
